nodes.text: Star Wars: Adventures Across the Galaxy

Star Wars: Adventures Across the Galaxy is a young-readers compilation title in the World of Reading series from Disney–Lucasfilm Press. It collects the previously published books Trouble on Tatooine, Trapped in the Death Star!, Captured on Cloud City, and The Fight in the Forest. Written by Nate Millici and Michael Siglain, with illustrations by Pilot Studio, Star Wars: Adventures Across the Galaxy was published on June 8, 2018.
